nio/RethinkDBChanges.description: Monitor a specified channel and send a signal whenever a change occurs.  This can be an insertion or update to a document in the table.

connect_timeout.title: Connect timeout
connect_timeout.description: Amount of time to wait to connect before dropping.

database_name.title: DB name
database_name.description: Name of database on the server.

host.title: Host
host.description: Server host ip, defaults to env variable.

port.title: Port
port.description: Server host port, defaults to env variable.

retry_options.title: Retry Options
retry_options.description: Configurables for retrying to connect to database

table.title: Table to watch
table.description: Name of the table to watch in the current database.

default.description: A signal with any changes that are pushed to the table that this block is watching.

nio/RethinkDBDelete.description: Delete an entry in a Rethink Database table.

connect_timeout.title: Connect timeout
connect_timeout.description: Amount of time to wait to connect before dropping.

database_name.title: DB name
database_name.description: Name of database on the server.

enrich.title: Signal Enrichment
enrich.description: If true, include the original incoming signal in the output signal.

filter.title: Filter by given fields
filter.description: Control which documents are matched and updated based on these strings.

host.title: Host
host.description: Server host ip, defaults to env variable.

port.title: Port
port.description: Server host port, defaults to env variable.

retry_options.title: Retry Options
retry_options.description: Configurables for retrying to connect to database.

table.title: Table to query
table.description: Name of the table to watch in the current database.

default.description: Any list of signals, the block expects an attribute to match the filters in the database
The result of the delete request to the server.

nio/RethinkDBInsert.description: Insert an entry into a Rethink Database table.

conflict.title: Conflict behavior
conflict.description: How the block should handle conflicting insert attempts

connect_timeout.description: Amount of time to wait to connect before dropping.

enrich.description: If true, include the original incoming signal in the output signal.

object.description: Data to insert into the database.

port.title: Port
port.description: Server host port, defaults to env variable.

retry_options.description: Configurables for retrying to connect to database.
